EnemyInfo.Name: Dead Ripper
EnemyInfo.Description:
Dead ripper that will decay when interacted with. This enemy's graphics is in the Dead Sidehopper enemy, so that enemy should be in the enemy types instead of this one. Palette should be set to 7.
Only 1 of each direction can be used in a room. If there are multiple enemies with the same direction, they incorrectly share decay animations.

Property.Name: Direction
Property.Description: Direction. Each direction should be used only once in a room.
